title: Binance dominance fell to 44% last year amid mounting regulatory and legal woes
description:
Crypto exchange Binance’s market share experienced a significant decline last year to 44.5%, according to data from Paris-based crypto intelligence platform Kaiko. This decline follows a three-year upward trend, where Binance’s market share surged from 22% in 2020 to peak at 60% in 2022. However, the subsequent regulatory hurdles across several jurisdictions contributed to the […]

The post Binance dominance fell to 44% last year amid mounting regulatory and legal woes appeared first on CryptoSlate.
